item.title: Example 9: Creating Dynamic 3D Animations using AnimationRecorder
item.description: Example 9: Creating Dynamic 3D Animations using AnimationRecorder Introduction In this tutorial, our focus will be on using the AnimationRecorder module to generate dynamic and visually appealing animations of our 3D scenes. We’ll be recording the results of our previous project, particularly the detailed visualizations of the muscles, bones and blood vessels created using PathTracer. Steps to do Open the network of Example 6.2, add a SoSeparator and an AnimationRecorder into your workspace and connect them as shown down.
